summary: Website update: add clickable social-media bubbles on the Contact page that link directly to provided social profiles.

existing_features.title: Update the social-media bubble links on the Contact page so that clicking each bubble opens the exact user-provided social profile URL in a new tab.

Ensure the social-media bubbles on the Contact page are visually and interactively “clickable” as bubbles (circular hit area), including clear hover and keyboard focus states consistent with the site theme.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add clickable social-media bubbles on the Contact page that open the provided Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram links.

projectName: Make Contact page social-media bubbles link to provided profiles
